documents.document: 4-0 now and #Žulj has been involved in all four, including a lovely assist for Berisha's goal. Dursun also gets his second. #SGFH96
@UKHannover_fans By far the worst.
#Žulj at his stunning best - involved in the build-up to Dursun's overhead kick with a flick-on, then glorious delivery for Franke's goal.
Ahead of tonight's 2. Bundesliga games, why not check out this week's column for @GGFN_? https://t.co/QYhgjyPULq
@Kudd3lmuddel Happens to the best of us...
Warning signs of a bloated squad - squad numbers for new signings: 30, 43, 44, 46... Gytkjær gets the no. 9 shirt. https://t.co/U67mBkHKHw
Ilir #Azemi is joining @Holstein_Kiel on loan 30 months after a career-threatening car accident. Remarkable. Good luck to him!
FT: @Hannover96 1-0 @Rote_Teufel - The hosts go top of the table with the win but it's very harsh on Norbert Meier's #Kaiserslautern side.
@MCabannes Aye, he's been awful tonight.
Basically this again in the second half. Osawe and Przybyłko goalshy from deliveries by Halfer and Mwene. #H96FCK https://t.co/SKZnVeV7MN
@simondopp Cracking cross there too.
#Kaiserslautern almost hit back immediately as Moritz curls a strike against the woodwork! So close, unlucky to have scored today. #H96FCK
TOR! It's harsh on #Kaiserslautern but #Hannover lead! Breakaway from a throw-in & #Bech scores on his first start back from injury! #H96FCK
One of top volantes in Brazil. Can't wait to watch him in 2. Bundesliga next year. #HSV https://t.co/BgwaAeYqAI
Kerk and Gaus have been superb down the left side. Shame that Przybyłko and Osawe have so far lacked the cutting edge required. #H96FCK
Visitors @Rote_Teufel are showing a lot more desire and spark under new coach Norbert Meier. Should be ahead at HT at @Hannover96 . #H96FCK
@simondopp He's set up your two best chances! For Kasper and Osawe.
"Sometimes I wonder how often I have to prove it." Hear, hear! #Liendl #TSV1860 https://t.co/wRnFSoEV5y
FT: @1_fc_nuernberg 1-2 @dynamodresden - Nürnberg were throwing the kitchen sink at Dresden by the end but the visitors hang on. Deserved.
Bizarre! #Dresden break from a corner through Hauptmann, it's 4v1 and he finds Stefaniak - who completely freezes and doesn't shoot! #FCNSGD
TOR! We're set up for an interesting end to this game as #Nürnberg pull one back! #Mühl taps in a rebound from a corner. 10 to go! #FCNSGD
I think there's a strong argument to be made that #Dresden play the best football in 2. Bundesliga. Today is no exception. #torstorstors
0-2! Just 15 seconds into the second half! Brilliant football again - Ballas to Kutschke to Lumpi to #Berko, who finishes smartly! #FCNSGD
Chances at both ends now - Möhwald should do better as he blazes over, before Kutschke rises high to head inches past the post. #FCNSGD
TOR! What a brilliantly worked goal! Another excellent ball by Modica, great wing-play by Berko and debutant #Heise has a tap-in! #FCNSGD
#Dynamo should be leading here. Brilliant reverse through ball by Modica, Lumpi squares it to Kutschke, but the big man can't reach! #FCNSGD
He's almost immediately involved too as Stefaniak plays a superb ball through to him. Great first touch but doesn't get a shot away. #FCNSGD
It's a like-for-like change though - in terms of being a joy to watch - as Niklas 'The Snake' Hauptmann comes on. #FCNSGD
@mjmreaks Too early to tell really but possibly. Huge shame, but then Hauptmann has come on and he's equally delightful to watch.
Scratch that. Gogia loses the ball and gets injured in the process. Off after just 8 minutes... #FCNSGD https://t.co/eigbf4Q5SI
Can't wait for this - @1_fc_nuernberg vs @dynamodresden. Gogia playing in central midfield for Dynamo - could be magical! #FCNSGD
@SGD_Liveticker Wo ist Teixeira?
Incredible counter-attacking goal from #Hoffenheim. That ball in the build-up from my boy Demirbay. <3 https://t.co/VQgZMJeq3j
TOR! And that's the winner! Superb strike from #Nazarov to restore #Aue's lead in injury time. Huge win but gutting for #Heidenheim.
1-1! It's come from a well-drilled throw-in routine - Schnatterer to Kleindienst to Titsch-Rivero to #Verhoek, who bundles it in! #AUEFCH
Crossbar! #Heidenheim come within inches of equalising! Still not exactly clear who got the final header from the corner though. #AUEFCH
TOR! It's come against the run of the play this half but #Aue lead! It's poor keeping from Müller and #Köpke taps in the rebound. #AUEFCH
#Heidenheim, on the other hand, look as though they have run out of ideas already. I can see Kleindienst coming on at the break. #AUEFCH
They're not as open at the back as previously and Köpke should give them the lead as he skips round Müller, but Strauss blocks on the line.
Much like their last game against Fortuna, @FCErzgebirgeAue are looking like a more solid outfit today against @FCH1846. Unlucky not to lead
@Kudd3lmuddel Nailed it!
FT: @TSV1860 2-1 @kleeblattfuerth - Sechzig rode their luck a bit but came away with a big win. Still lessons to be learnt though. #m60sgf
TOR! This game really could have gone either way but #Liendl may have just secured it for 1860! Cracking finish that. 2-1 with five to go.
Rote Karte! #Sama making a debut that Jonathan Woodgate would be proud of - giving away a penalty and getting sent off. Both harsh. #m60sgf
@Kudd3lmuddel Bit worrying when Uduokhai is looking like your most mature, experienced defender...
1-1! I still don't have a clue what 1860's penalty was given for but #Olic (just about) tucked it away. Megyeri should have done better.
Pereira's 3-4-3 system always seemed like it could be genius or disastrous. Adding a defender may add cover but can't stop individual errors
Embarrassing display from 1860 so far. Errors and misplaced passes all over the pitch. #Fürth haven't done anything but took their chance.
Clanger! Some things never change! A defensive mix-up by Mauersberger & Ortega gifts #Dursun a goal after 12 minutes! Classic 1860. #m60sgf
Two new permanent head coaches clashing in this one - how will Vitor Pereira's 3-4-3 system get on against Radoki's #Fürth side? #m60sgf
The long wait is finally over! 2. Bundesliga is finally back! I'll be casting an eye over @TSV1860 vs @kleeblattfuerth. #m60sgf
@BerlinYellow I imagine because it's Holocaust Memorial Day
@FRfotballBen I'm cautiously optimistic. I imagine that Porto fans have higher standards to be met than 1860 supporters, hopefully...
The other likely new arrival, Ba Abdoulaye, is not exactly garnering rave reviews either. Big signings though. https://t.co/9rJwTfXzGq
1860's supposed new signing, everyone! https://t.co/G3aoLo2F5P
@LouisTozer You're not wrong there mate. This was the opening of two new stands at the U21 stadium. Their main one is 49k capacity though.
@1860_UK Trump sympathises.
Fascinating discussion with Marius, the analytical brain behind @niemalsalleinDE - the best tactical writing you'll find on Zweite Liga.
Sunset game in #Hannover. Not a bad way to end this flying visit of a few 2. Bundesliga towns. Been a pleasure!… https://t.co/t1Jt56wf2o
A mix of old ways and new ways in Düsseldorf - a suitable metaphor for the #Fortuna squad this season. Wonderful ho… https://t.co/AIx8EArJ4O
@Rupert_Fryer Fair enough, the NT keeper situation has always been strange. Maybe Volpi's not on the radar cos he's not in Brazil or Europe.
@Rupert_Fryer @BGT_ENG @goal Seen any suggestion of Tiago Volpi ever getting a call up? Best keeper in Mexico, been in stunning form I heard
Big thanks to @p_rentsch for kindly given me a tour around lovely Bochum! Next stop is down the road in Düsseldorf. #FRanalystTrip
We meet again... #Bochum #FRanalystTrip https://t.co/Nkhk6iODyQ
.@dynamodresden are playing some lovely stuff in this friendly against @fc_zuerich. 3-0 before half-time - the latest a wonderful team goal.
Kutschke might never score an easier goal than this - a long ball bouncing over the keeper's head for an open goal. https://t.co/Ajs5fBc2xU
Captain Fabian is having a shocker too unfortunately. Could have been sent off by now if this wasn't a friendly. Deficit should be greater.
Shambolic friendly between @bayer04fussball and @VfLBochum1848eV so far. Embarrassing gaffs from Dornebusch and the hosts lead 1-0. #B04BOC
@TomDanicek One of my favourite players. https://t.co/sm84UBFkBe
@thesimoncsays I think his contract situation means that they may not be able to hold out for that much. But it depends on how he performs.
@thesimoncsays I think I read that the club are looking for up to 5 million Euros for him.
Bebou starts for Togo in their #AFCON game against Ivory Coast. Read all about him and the tournament here. #CIVTOG https://t.co/OThQAMiaSR
Now he's scored himself a few days later! 2-1 to #Hannover, but Youngs Boy should have equalised. #96inJerez https://t.co/jptm8ru7xx
Anton & Arkenberg really aren't covering themselves in glory down the right side of the defence today. The Swiss side are on top. #96inJerez
1-1 already after @BSC_YB equalise from range. Poor judgement of the bounce and wind from Arkenberg and he gets punished for it. #96inJerez
That's a lovely goal from #Hannover though - transitioned so quickly from back to front, ending with Harnik volleying in a Karaman cross.
Thought this was Karaman being selfish last time but Prib has now done the same thing, but 25 yards out... Bizarre. https://t.co/OaVO9dEAt3
TOR! Onel Hernandez doesn't seem to have lost any of his pace in the snow as he burns past a defender to score. Terrible keeping. #ebssvw
Great fun this. Hochscheidt wrongly has a goal disallowed but the linesmen probably can't see a thing anyway. Kumbela then fluffed a chance.
Ladies and gentlemen, we have ourselves a #SNOWGAME! Can't wait for this second half! #ebssvw https://t.co/IsVPUFq34R
The bar has been hit FOUR times now already in this half. Twice for each team, with Decarli's shot the only one to go in off the woodwork.
1-1 now in #Braunschweig where the snow is tumbling down. Lovely finish from Gnabry and #Bremen are starting to cut the home side open.
#Braunschweig should have been losing to @werderbremen after Kruse hit the bar earlier but Decarli's went in off the crossbar. #ebssvw
DECARLI! There's a good reason why I got his name printed on my @EintrachtBSNews shirt and it's finishes like that from the centre-back!
Erm, what was that, Kenan Karaman? Wide free-kick, 30 yards out - he flicks it up & slices a volley away from goal. S'pose it is a friendly.
Happy to see Uffe Bech back and fit again for @Hannover96, but he faces some strong competition. Nice assist for Sobiech's cheeky backheel.
Liendl and Rodnei combining for a goal - the stuff @FRfussballTim's dreams are made of. https://t.co/2fqISL05MG
3-0! It's another lovely goal by #Heidenheim, thanks to an unbelievable pass by young Kevin Lankford. Big John Verhoek converts. #FCHinOliva
@jonathanwalsh_ They seem to lay a new one every few months, I think because the ESPRIT Arena hosts other events. Must cost a 'fortune'...
@jonathanwalsh_ Pitch is going to be ruined for the return of the league though, unless they shell out for a new turf between now and then.
@jonathanwalsh_ It's embarrassing to watch. Mental decision to stage another game there after the Carl Zeiss Jena one the other day.
2-0! That's an absolute belter from new centre-back signing Hauke Wahl - left-footed volley, in off the crossbar! Good energy to the game.
Nice to see no dip in intensity for this rare friendly between two 2. Bundesliga sides - @FCH1846 vs @fcunion. Lovely team goal for #FCH.
@UKFortuna Just missed the best chance of the game with only a few minutes to go so not great... His movement has been good though.
It's been a joy to watch Taylan Duman this half. Always liked him. His brain (and feet) work so fast. Still 1-1 though. #F95visitsMalta
@tiertwofooty Hero. He's been great fun.
@4Enge I liked the look of him in preseason but after that injury he never got a chance. Hoping to see more of him in 2017.
Akpoguma and new signing Gül are both really struggling either side of him though. Being given the run around by the Maltese Hibs. 1-1.
That or Alex Madlung's majestic performance at centre-back. Good to see him back fit again. #F95visitsMalta
The best bit of this @f95 friendly might be opposition coach Mark Miller's Geordie swearing puncturing the stadium silence. #F95visitsMalta
